title: Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey
itunes:author: American Public Media
description:
Do you need a best friend? Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey of the “The L Word” join Tig to give advice on long-lasting friendships, confronting cheaters and when a hickey goes too far.

Check out Kate and Leisha’s PANTS podcast.

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp Online Counseling (betterhelp.com/Tig).


Need advice? Submit your question for Tig at dontasktig.org/contact.

Follow us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @DontAskTig.
